name: Galaxy Forces VR (itch)
description:
A single player space shooter game in VR. You are in control of a ship and the goal is to race against the clock to get the fastest time (race), or transport cargo to get the best score (mission). Flying in a space cave with evil enemies.

There are more than 90 levels. Released on the Oculus Store (PC), Steam and AppLab for Quest. Online hi-scores and further details on the web site https://www.galaxy-forces-vr.com/ The game is discussed here https://discord.gg/cjptxT5JCb

I have made updates continuously after the release, and the game is now very well polished. You can create your own levels with the editor and submit to me to add to all players through the web site. Unity source code is available at https://sourceforge.net/projects/galaxy-forces-vr/files/src/

The Steam version can be played without VR and without hiscores. But I did macos, windows and linux versions just for this site. There is progress and hiscores, but for VR you need to download through one of the stores mentioned above. The Linux version has only been tested on a virtual machine @1 fps.

Latest additions are
- add swinging cargo mode
- use universal render pipeline (PC)
- add glow postprocessing (PC)
- replaced skyboxes
- replaced planet below your feet
- add adjust height (Y) and front (Z)
- collision stuck fix
- auto land with point motion
- auto fire with point motion
- not instant kill on stationary enemies
- add easy mode
- add sky view (quest)
- add point motion
